item.title: Eve Thermo: Understanding and adjusting Temperature Offset
item.content:encoded:
Product Features
Eve Thermo relies on the proven technology of Hessian specialist Eurotronic for heat regulation, which works in the heating controllers of many leading smart home providers. Leveraging HomeKit as well as Eve technologies, Eurotronic's drive and control algorithm ensure comfort and efficiency. This makes saving energy easy. We're introducing you here to a hardware feature important for heat regulation: The adjustable Temperature Offset.

item.title: Even penguins enjoy keeping cozy thanks to smart heating in the kindergarten
item.content:encoded:
Use Cases
A parent-run initiative like ours consumes a great deal of time and effort, plus we need to keep a constant eye on our operating costs. However, as we don’t just want to save money, but also lighten the load on our staff and the environment, we’ve recently started using smart radiator valves to intelligently control the indoor temperature. In this post we share the lessons we’ve learned.
